alert.note: Alert for Koochiching; Lake; St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 10:27PM CDT until June 20 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Koochiching County in north central Minnesota... St. Louis County in northeastern Minnesota... Western Lake County in northeastern Minnesota... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1026 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Kabetogama, to near Lake Vermilion, to 8 miles northeast of Cotton, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Whiteface Reservoir around 1040 PM CDT. Robinson and Voyageurs National Park around 1045 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Wolf Lake, Burntside Lake, Ely, Winton, Brimson, White Iron Lake, Fall Lake, Highland Lake, Thomas Lake Near Brimson, Birch Lake, western Boundary Waters Canoe Area Wilderness and Castle Danger. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
